-- Tạo cơ sở dữ liệu
CREATE DATABASE QuanLyBanHang;
-- Sử dụng cơ sở dữ liệu
USE QuanLyBanHang;

-- Tạo các bảng
CREATE TABLE nhanvien (
    manv INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    hovaten VARCHAR(255),
    ngaysinh DATE,
    diachi VARCHAR(255),
    sodienthoai VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    chucvu VARCHAR(50),
    macn INT
);

CREATE TABLE chinhanh (
    macn INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    tencn VARCHAR(255),
    diachi VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    sodithoai VARCHAR(20),
    quanli INT,
    makho INT
);

CREATE TABLE admin_account (
    usernameadmin VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY,
    passwordadmin VARCHAR(255),
    manv INT,
    macn INT
);

CREATE TABLE khohang (
    makho INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    tenkho varchar(20)
);


CREATE TABLE giaodich (
    magd INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    ngaygiaodich DATETIME,
    loai_giaodich VARCHAR(50),
    soluong INT,
    giatrigiaodich FLOAT,
    trangthai VARCHAR(50),
    makho INT,
    masp INT
);

CREATE TABLE sanpham (
    masp INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    tensanpham VARCHAR(255),
    Commpany VARCHAR(50),
    typename VARCHAR(50),
    inches float,
    sreenresolution VARCHAR(50),
    cpu VARCHAR(50),
    ram VARCHAR(30),
    memory varchar(50),
    gpu varchar(50),
    Weight varchar(25),
    giaban FLOAT,
    mota VARCHAR(500),
    makm INT
);

CREATE TABLE khachhang (
    makh INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    hovaten VARCHAR(255),
    loaikh VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    sodienthoai VARCHAR(20),
    diachi VARCHAR(255),
    ngaysinh DATE,
    diemtich INT
);

CREATE TABLE account (
    password_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    password VARCHAR(255),
    manv INT,
    makh INT
);

CREATE TABLE danhgia (
    madg INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    diemdanhgia INT,
    thoigiandanhgia DATETIME,
    binhluan VARCHAR(255),
    masp INT,
    makh INT
);

CREATE TABLE giohang (
    magh INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    soluong INT,
    masp INT,
    makh INT
);

CREATE TABLE khuyenmai (
    makm INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    loaikm VARCHAR(50),
    sotienkm FLOAT,
    ngaybatdau DATE,
    ngaykethuc DATE,
    dieukien VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE donhang (
    madh INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    ngaydathang DATE,
    trangthaidonhang VARCHAR(50),
    makm INT
);

CREATE TABLE hoadon (
    mahd INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    ngaylaphd DATE,
    tongtien FLOAT,
    trangthai VARCHAR(50),
    madh INT
);

CREATE TABLE baohanh (
    mabh INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    ngaybatdau DATE,
    ngayketthuc DATE,
    loaibaohanh VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ctdh (
    madh INT,
    masp INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (madh, masp),
    soluong INT,
    giaban FLOAT,
    mabh INT
);

-- Thêm khóa ngoại
ALTER TABLE nhanvien
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (macn) REFERENCES chinhanh(macn);

ALTER TABLE admin_account
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (manv) REFERENCES nhanvien(manv),
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (macn) REFERENCES chinhanh(macn);

ALTER TABLE sanpham
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (makm) REFERENCES khuyenmai(makm);

ALTER TABLE account
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (manv) REFERENCES nhanvien(manv),
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (makh) REFERENCES khachhang(makh);

ALTER TABLE danhgia
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (masp) REFERENCES sanpham(masp),
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (makh) REFERENCES khachhang(makh);

ALTER TABLE giohang
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (masp) REFERENCES sanpham(masp),
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (makh) REFERENCES khachhang(makh);

ALTER TABLE donhang
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (makm) REFERENCES khuyenmai(makm);

ALTER TABLE hoadon
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (madh) REFERENCES donhang(madh);

ALTER TABLE ctdh
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (madh) REFERENCES donhang(madh),
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (masp) REFERENCES sanpham(masp),
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (mabh) REFERENCES baohanh(mabh);

ALTER TABLE giaodich
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (makho) REFERENCES khohang(makho),
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (masp) REFERENCES sanpham(masp);

        UPDATE chinhanh
        SET quanli = 1
        WHERE macn = 1;

        UPDATE chinhanh
        SET quanli = 11
        WHERE macn = 2;

        UPDATE chinhanh
        SET quanli = 21
        WHERE macn = 3;

        UPDATE chinhanh
        SET quanli = 31
        WHERE macn = 4;


        UPDATE chinhanh
        SET quanli = 41
        WHERE macn = 5;
